owl:Ontology.dc:creator: Serge Chávez Feria
owl:Ontology.dc:description: The Occupancy Profile ontology has been developed to represent people’s behavior inside buildings with a focus on the energy impact their actions produce.
owl:Ontology.dc:title: Occupancy Profile ontology

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Building where the occupancy behaviors occur.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Building

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Class to represent the different spaces the building have and where the occupant behaviors occur.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Space

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Actions are the interactions with systems or activities that occupants can perform to achieve environmental comfort.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Action

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Class that represent the behaviour of the occupant.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Behavior

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: N-ary class to represent the value and the names of coefficients inside mathematical formulas.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Coefficient

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Class to represent mathematical formulas of the type Constant Value.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Constant Value Formula

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Parameter to represent the indoor daylight.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Daylight Factor Parameter

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: N-ary class to define the time, day and season when a specific driver occurs.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Driver Time

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Drivers represent the environmental factors that stimulate occupants to fulfill a physical, physiological or psychological need.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Drivers

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Class to represent the environmental physical conditions that could be causing the occupant behavior.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Environment

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Class that represent a physical variable of the environment where the driver occurs. It could represent variables that impact directly on the comfort levels of the occupant.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Environment Parameter

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Class to represent equipments the occupant interact with but do not influence the environment. These systems also contribute in the energy performance analysis.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Equipment

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Parameter to represent the glare inside a space.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Glare Parameter

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Class to represent occupant habits.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Habit

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Parameter to represent the indoor air quality.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: IAQ Parameter

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Parameter to represent the amount of illumination inside a space.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Illuminance Parameter

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: The Inaction class represents the decision of an occupant to not act and remain uncomfortable within a space.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Inaction

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: The Interaction class represents the interaction of the occupant with the systems within the space to recover its comfort.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Interaction

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Formula to model the probability of interaction between ocupant and system.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Interaction Formula

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Class to represent mathematical formulas of the type Linear 1D.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Linear Formula

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Class to represent mathematical formulas of the type Logit 2D Linear.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Logit Formula

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Class to represent a meeting inside a communal space.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Meeting

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: The Movement class is used to represent the occupants movements inside a space.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Movement

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Model to define ocuppants movements inside a space
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Movement Model

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Class to represent the data needed to model movements inside a space.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Movement Specification

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Needs represent the physical and non-physical requirements of the occupant that must be met in order to ensure satisfaction with their environment.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Need

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Parameter to represent the amount of indoor and outdoor noise
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Noise Parameter

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Non physical comfort need that could lead to a behavior, such as privacy, schedule, etc.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Non Physical Need

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Occupant within the building.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Occupant

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: N-ary class to represent the minimum and maximm comfort values with respect to an environmental parameter.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Parameter Range

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Physical comfort need that could lead to a behavior.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Physical Need

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Class to represent mathematical formulas of the type Quadratic 1D Linear.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Quadratic Formula

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Parameter to represent raining outdoors.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Raining Parameter

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Parameter to represent indoor and outdoor relative humidity.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Relative Humidity Parameter

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: The Report class indicates that an occupant seeks assistance or files a complaint about their personal discomfort, but does not take direct action to satisfy their needs.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Report

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: N-ary class to represent the duration, start time and end time of an event.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Schedule

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Parameter to represent solar irradiance indoors and outdoors.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Solar Irradiance Parameter

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: System refer to the equipment or mechanisms within the building with which occupants may interact with to restore or maintain environmental comfort.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: System

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Parameter to represent indoor and outdoor temperature.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Temperature Parameter

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Class to represent mathematical formulas of the type Weibull 1D.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Weibull Formula
